ModMetaData.name: Sexuality Traits
ModMetaData.author: Scotty, Taranchuk, Delran
ModMetaData.description:
Sexuality Traits is a mod aimed at player control for sexuality assignment and adding a straight trait
In case of any feedback or bug reports, please utilise the comment section of the mod on the Steam workshop. All coding done by the wonderful Taranchuk from the Rimworld Mod Market. [url=https://discord.gg/7befJWr9xS][img]https://i.imgur.com/cfoFEMA.png[/img][/url]
